comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: btcpepa04 on August 25, 2022, 12:46:44 PMI NEED 100$ of bitcoin loan  I will pay 120$ in 1 monthYou are senior than me on this forum but you don't know that you have no chance to get any loan from here without collateral base on your rank and reputation. It made me astonished!

comments.author: TheUltraElite
comments.body: Quote from: btcpepa04 on August 25, 2022, 12:46:44 PMI NEED 100$ of bitcoin loan  I will pay 120$ in 1 month Sell the device which you are using to post in this forum. You will probably get more than 100$ and you will be free from the headache of paying back.Without a collateral and considering your trust rating, only a fool will consider handing you any amount of money.
